name: Theft Ward
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Advanced Race Guide © 2012, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You ward a single object in your possession against theft. You gain a +10 bonus on Perception checks to notice someone trying to take the object from you.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害，物品)
text_zh: 你可以使你身上的单件物品难以被盗。你在发现有人尝试从你身上取走该物品的察觉检定上获得+10加值。
